objects.text:
• Iconic Black & White Colorway
• Premium Leather Construction
• Vintage Aesthetic with Aged Midsole
• Classic High-Top Silhouette

product_details.name: Vintage Nike Air Jordan 1 High - Classic Black & White Colorway
product_details.description:
• Authentic Nike Air Jordan 1 High basketball sneakers
• Iconic black and white colorway (Panda-like color scheme)
• Premium leather upper construction with perforated toe box
• Classic high-top silhouette with padded collar for ankle support
• Original Nike swoosh branding on sides
• Vintage aesthetic with naturally aged midsole
• Durable rubber outsole with classic traction pattern
• Timeless basketball heritage design
• Collectible retro sneaker with historical significance
• Versatile style suitable for both casual wear and collecting

banner_details:
This square banner design presents a vintage yet bold promotional layout highlighting a footwear product. It features a large, attention-grabbing heading (id: "heading") in black, followed by a vibrant red promotional tagline (id: "tagline"). A decorative horizontal red line divides the top texts from feature highlights (id: "description") listed with bullet points. A subheading (id: "subheading") in modern typography accents the section above the prominent full-width product image (id: "product_image"). The price (id: "price") is displayed in bold with a black rupee symbol, accompanied below by a solid black call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") labeled "SHOP NOW" (id: "cta"). The backdrop includes layered geometric patterns and a thin border styling for emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F5F5F5
- Primary Text: #000000
- Accent Red: #E53935
- Sub Text: #333333
- Call-to-Action Button: #000000 (with white text)
- Light Circle Overlay: rgba(0,0,0,0.02)
product_color: The product image highlights a vintage pair of sneakers featuring a muted and raw aesthetic. The dominant colors include deep charcoal black (#1C1C1C), aged ivory white (#E6E1D0), and a rusty brown-orange for stitching accents (#8B4C2F). These colors blend seamlessly, evoking a retro and worn-in feel while the contrast between the black and white sections provides visual interest. The slightly yellowed midsole (#D2C29D) emphasizes the nostalgic, aged quality. For an advertisement banner, incorporating complementary tones like muted greys (#3A3A3A) or background creams (#F5F1EB) will enhance the product's gritty yet classic appeal while spotlighting its rich texture and originality.
